content: Credit Card Lifestyle Asked by AnonymousAsked on 12 Mar 2019suggestions to optimise vendor payment?Apart from the wedding banquet that can be paid using credit cards, what else can a couple do to earn cashback/miles from individual vendors that do not accept credit payment?1 answerAnswerBump0
Answers (1)Sort By Most UpvoteMost UpvoteMost Recent

Lok Yang TengLevel 6. MasterAnswered on 13 Mar 2019If the vendor does not credit card, I suppose debit cards can't too. You can ask if they accept using QR code payments. If that fails, then you're left with paying by cash and you wouldn't have any rewards for that.0 comments0
